segments.text: I think I'll write a book .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All of the time tested healthy habits from around the world .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You have done a lot of traveling . I'll bet you've learned quite a bit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The interesting thing is to see what really works and what's just hype .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because you can see the results with the general public ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's right . I think we all have much we can learn from each other .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would buy that kind of book !
segments.speaker: S2
